Item ID1289

A rune sword is a medium-level sword made out of rune. Like all rune weapons, it requires 40 Attack to wield.

A rune sword can be created at level 89 Smithing using 1 rune bar, giving the player 75 Smithing experience.

Rune swords are ideal for non-member Ironmen as the only way to obtain a rune scimitar in a free-to-play world is to create it from scratch, requiring 90 Smithing and 85 Mining, whereas a rune sword can be purchased from Scavvo's Rune Store in the Champions' Guild for a price of 20,800 after obtaining 32 quest points.

[[File:Rune sword detail.png|left|100px]]
A '''rune sword''' is a medium-level [[sword]] made out of [[Rune equipment|rune]]. Like all rune weapons, it requires 40 [[Attack]] to wield.

A rune sword can be created at level 89 [[Smithing]] using 1 [[rune bar]], giving the player 75 Smithing [[experience]].

Rune swords are ideal for non-member [[Ironman Mode|Ironmen]] as the only way to obtain a [[rune scimitar]] in a [[free-to-play]] world is to create it from scratch, requiring 90 Smithing and 85 [[Mining]], whereas a rune sword can be purchased from [[Scavvo's Rune Store]] in the [[Champions' Guild]] for a price of {{Coins|20800}} after obtaining 32 [[quest points]].
